job_description:
As a Software Intern (Backend)

You should be having interest/knowledge on Back-end technologies
like Java, Java frameworks, Golang, Node.js. (you will be further
trained on these technologies).
You will be trained on:
Database NOSQL, MongoDB, SQL (MS SQL, Oracle, MySQL)
Training on some of the recent and trending technologies like AEM,
ALM and Workfront.
Exposure with web services (RESTful) and web technologies in general.

 

AS A SOFTWARE INTERN (Frontend)
You should be having interest / knowledge front-end technologies like
JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, jQuery, ReactJS, MERN, Flutter, NextJS.
You will be trained on:
Databases MongoDB, MySQL, Oracle
Training on some of the recent and trending technologies like AEM, ALM
and Workfront.
Exposure with web services (RESTful) and web technologies in general

Kind attention: B.Tech/M.Tech/INTGT CSE, IT & ECE / MCA 2026 Batch Students.

Eligibility Criteria: As per placement policy, having 7.00 CGPA and above in current degree (BTech, MTech, INTGT) and MCA, with no active backlog(s).
 
Note: Students will be properly dressed in college uniform with neck-tie for the activities pertaining to the placement drives e.g. PPT, Test, GD, interviews, etc. No jeans will be worn. Students will put-on black leather shoes and belt.  Students are advised to take bath on the day of the drive, put on a properly cleaned & ironed uniform, and look fresh. Hairs should be properly combed and  beard properly trimmed. M.Tech. & M.Sc. students will be in business-formals and no round-neck shirts will be worn.

Students are requested not to absent themselves from any stage of the placement drive/event as it may invite disciplinary action.

Students are hereby cautioned not to indulge in unfair means while undertaking the placement drive test. Please do not talk to anyone or take help on cell phones or on line or from peer-groups. Students involved in such acts of cheating, if caught and communicated by the company, their offers will be revoked and disciplinary action initiated.

Website: https://www.oracle.com/in/corporate/

The additional information is listed below for your quick reference:

Job Title: Associate Consultant (Consulting Role)

Role Type: Full Time

Location(s): Bengaluru, Mumbai, Pune or Chennai

 

Salary Component

Annual Amount (INR)

Total Year 1 Earning Potential

Rs. 9,82,054/-

Our cloud solutions are transforming the world of business, empowering governments, and helping society evolve with the pace of change. Join our team of top-class consultants and help our customers achieve more than ever before.

What Youll Do

Whether youre onsite or sharing your expertise via the cloud, youll deliver top-class support and inspire customer loyalty. As a Associate Consultant, you will:
Receives detailed instruction on routine work and on new projects or assignments. As a member of a project team, follows standard practices and procedures to analyze situations/data and provide quality work products to deliver functional and technical solutions on applications and technology installations.

What Youll Bring

You have that rare combinationa sharp technical brain and a head for business. Youll use this to help customers achieve real-world success with our products. We also look for:
Problem solving and applying relevant Oracle methodologies and practices with limited autonomy.
Work involves some Implements Oracle products and technology in various industries to meet customer specifications.
Ability to communicate effectively and build rapport with team members and clients.
Demonstrates basic competence in one product or technology area.
Ability to travel as needed
Superb documentation skills & strong analytical abilities

 

Campus Drive Schedule:

Moreover, please provide guidance on the dates for carrying out the following procedure listed below:

 

Campus Process

Timelines

Online Assessment Test ( 2 Hours )

13-Aug-25 at 5:00 PM

Pre-Placement Talk

19-Aug-25 (9:00 AM to 10:00 AM)

Personal Interviews

19-Aug-25 (10:30 AM Onwards)

Vinod Kumar
Sr. Officer

job_description:
Company Overview:

Join our high-growth SaaS company, Recruit CRM, where innovation meets impact! With a 40% YoY growth, we power over 1,700 top Executive Search and Recruitment firms across 100+ countries. Headquartered across the US, Ireland, India and Dubai, we are ranked #1 in our category by Gartner and boast a stellar 4.9/5 rating on Capterra & G2. Discover more about us at www.recruitcrm.io.

 

Why Join Us?

  • Fully remote
  • Sponsored L&D programs
  • Company-paid team outbounds
  • Competitive pay & full insurance coverage
  • After one year of being an employee, you're eligible for our ARR-Linked Performance Bonus, announced every January 1st. Inclusion and bonus amounts are subject to management discretion.

 If you're looking for a high-impact role where you can grow quickly, build meaningful client relationships, and solve real-world challenges, this is the place for you!

Current Opening:

We are looking for a competitive, innovative, and driven individual to join our Customer Success Team as a Customer Success Associate upon successfully completing our traineeship program. In this role, you will work closely with cross-functional teamsincluding Customer Success, Product, and Engineeringto transform insights into impactful product features and solutions.

 

Location: Remote What You Will Do:

  • Learn our platform Recruit CRM and understand the recruitment business.
  • Handle client queries via chat, email and video calls to gain experience.
  • Understand and convey customer needs to the team.
  • Solve user challenges, providing solutions or workarounds.
  • Uphold communication guidelines and procedures.
  • Build and nurture client relationships.
  • Continuously strive for exceptional service delivery.

 Traineeship Details:

  • Traineeship Program: 6 months; 8.5 hours per day, payment of INR 20,000 per month.
  • Full-Time Opportunity: Upon successful completion of the training program and based on performance, you may be offered a full-time position as Customer Success Associate with a CTC of INR 8,00,000 (INR 6,00,000 base salary + INR 2,00,000 yearly performance pay)

 

During the initial 6-month training period you'll be working in the primary Europe shift, youll transition to one of our five core work shifts as a full-time employee.

 

  • Europe - Noon - 10 pm Monday - Friday
  • Asia Pacific - 6 am - 4 pm Monday - Friday
  • Half North America - 4 pm - 2 am Monday - Friday
  • Full North America - 8 pm - 6 am Monday - Friday
  • Middle East - Can choose from 4 options (4 days or 5 days a week)

 

(The availability of these shifts is based on requirement)

 

Who Should Apply?

We invite applications exclusively from freshers who will be completing their graduation/post graduation in 2026, irrespective of their specialization. If you are passionate about data-driven insights, eager to learn and adapt, and ready to take on challenges with a proactive and innovative mindset, you are the perfect fit for our team.

 

Selection Process (Online/Virtual): Our process includes several rounds such as an online test (MCQ), assignment, and virtual interviewsall designed to assess your analytical thinking, communication skills, and problem-solving abilities.

 

Take the leap and launch your career with Recruit CRMwhere your curiosity, commitment to excellence, and creative problem-solving skills are valued and nurtured.

Hiring Interns from 2026 Batch - To be converted to Full Time Role based on the performance during Internship from Jan, 2026 to June, 2026

The key details are as follows:

  • Internship Stipend: INR 35,000 per month

  • Internship Duration: Jan 2026 - June 2026

  • Post-Internship: Successful interns will be converted into full-time employees based on performance.

Job Description (Refer Attached Job Details for more information.)

We are looking for highly motivated Data Solutions Associate Interns to join our dynamic team. This internship offers a unique opportunity to work on real-world data engineering, analytics, and AI/ML projects for Fortune 100 clients across industries such as Hi-tech, Healthcare, Retail, and SaaS.

As a Data Solutions Associate Intern, you will:

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand client business challenges and translate them into data-driven solutions.

  • Assist in designing and implementing data analytics solutions, data pipelines, and analytics dashboards

  • Support the development and deployment of scalable data solutions using modern cloud platforms and tools.

  • Participate in agile ceremonies such as daily standups and sprint planning to ensure timely delivery of project milestones.

  • Work closely with senior engineers and analysts to continuously learn and contribute to high-impact projects. This role is ideal for individuals who are passionate about data, eager to learn, and excited to work in a fast-paced, innovation-driven environment

Background

  • Recently completed or in the final year of an undergraduate degree in a quantitative discipline such as Computer Science, Mathematics, or related fields from a top-tier institution.

  • Familiarity with Generative AI concepts

  • Basic understanding of data engineering concepts and familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP is a plus.

  • Familiarity with Generative AI concepts, and foundational models is preferred

Skills

  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.

  • Effective communication and interpersonal skills.

  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple projects simultaneously.

  • Basic knowledge of SQL and data visualization tools is a plus.

  • Familiarity with any programming languages such as Python, Java, or Scala.

  • Willingness to learn and adapt to modern technologies and methodologies.

  • Highly adaptable to change and a good team player with the ability to collaborate effectively.

The internship will be based out of Gurugram/Chennai Location.

The intern shall undergo performance evaluation at the end of the internship. Full-time employment offer may be extended to the intern basis his/her performance during the internship.

job_description:
Lending Labs (formerly Kuliza Technologies) is Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 to be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during the 06-month Internships from August 2025 to January 2026.

This opportunity begins with an internship starting from August 2025 till January 2026, offering a stipend of INR 50,000 per month.

Date of joining as an intern: Immediately


This will transition to a full-time position based on performance during the Internship and the then prevailing market conditions with a salary package of INR 10 Lakhs.

The date of joining as a full-time employee will be June 2026.

Eligible students who have already registered on NPTEL for MOOC courses need to volunteer.

The company will try to close this drive by 26 August.

Oracle is a global provider of cloud computing solutions, offering software and hardware to businesses worldwide so they may boost productivity, innovate, and become more creative. Together with that, we developed the first and only autonomous database in history to assist organise and safeguard the data of our clients. Oracle Cloud Infrastructure offers higher performance, security, and cost savings.

The design facilitates the seamless migration of workloads between on-premises systems and cloud computing, as well as between cloud computing and on-premises systems. Oracle Cloud applications give corporate executives access to cutting-edge tools that support their ability to innovate, achieve sustainable growth, and build resilience. In addition to changing the corporate landscape, the work we conduct supports government defense efforts as well as the advancement of scientific and medical research.

About Chetu Inc.
Founded in 2000, Chetu is an award-winning software development and support provider with over 2,800 software professionals globally. The company operates three major development centers in Sector 63, Noida, spanning 155,000+ sq. ft. of state-of-the-art workspace. In addition to cutting-edge development environments, Chetu offers a complimentary Skill Training & Development Centre, modern amenities, and programs such as gyms, cafeterias, and company-sponsored clubs to promote a growth-oriented culture.

As a leading service-based software company, Chetu is looking to recruit B.Tech, and M.Tech programs for their rapidly expanding teams.

Onboarding & Training
The structured onboarding process consists of:

  • 3 months of basic corporate training.
  • 3 months of On-The-Job Training (OTJ).
    Upon completion of the 6-month probationary period, employees will receive a competitive salary appraisal aligned with industry standards.

Eligibility Criteria

  1. Graduation in 2026 .
  2. Qualification: B.Tech, or M.Tech.
  3. Freshers with good communication and presentation skills.
  4. Minimum aggregate of 7.5 CGPA across academics (10th, 12th, Graduation, Post-Graduation if applicable).
  5. TPO to share complete student documentation prior to the campus drive for verification.

Recruitment Process

  1. Entrance Test & Group Discussion to assess coding/programming knowledge.
  2. 3-6 months of coding training and workplace etiquette sessions.
  3. Face-to-face interviews with HR and Floor Managers at Chetus Noida facility.
  4. Signing of a Two-Year Commitment prior to joining the Skill Centre (commitment period excludes trainee phase).
  5. Early conversion to Team Member possible within 12 months based on exceptional performance.

Process

  1. Candidateswill first clear the Entrance Test & Group Discussion to demonstrate their basic knowledge of Coding/ Programming.
  2. The candidate will then receive three to Six months of coding training and basic office culture etiquette. Face-to-face interviews with our HR Team and Floor Managers are conducted at our Chetu facility after training.
  3. Student need to signed  a"Two-Year Commitment" with the company before starting the journey with Chetu skill centre, This will not include the  period start from the offered date as Trainee for the operation floor.
  4. Oncethe trainee has completed three months of training, they will be on - boarded as a permanent Chetu "Team Member." Depending on their performance, however, trainees can become a "Team Member" in a short time of 1 to 2 months when exhibiting exceptional skill and understanding.

Required Documentation

  • Student Level Agreement & Affidavit.
  • Post-dated cheque of 3,00,000 (in favor of Chetu (I) Pvt. Ltd.), refundable upon completion of stated employment.

Salary Structure

Stage

Duration

Gross Earnings ()

Basic Corporate Training

Months 1-3

15,000- 20,000

OTJ (Trainee) / Team Member

Months 3-6

30,000 -50,000

Post First Appraisal

After 6 months

6 -10 LPA CTC

Employee Benefits

  • Fully covered healthcare for employees & families.
  • Rental subsidies & company transportation.
  • Retirement planning and additional perks.

More details are available at www.chetu.com.

job_description:
• Participate in the full 5-month Agile-based cohort lifecycle, including daily standups, weekly reviews, biweekly leadership briefings, and monthly milestone checks.
  • Collaborate with mentors, advisors, and peers to design, develop, and iterate on your AI driven project idea.
  • Deliver key project artifacts and outputs, including:
    1. Month 1: Program Plan
    2. Month 2: Proof of Concept (PoC)
    3. Month 3: Prototype
    4. Months 4-5: Minimum Viable Product (MVP) and refinements
  • Engage in end-of-program activities: demo day, final pitch deck, case study, and documentation package.
  • Participate in program-wide retrospectives and After Action Reviews (AARs)
package_info:
Stipend: INR 15.00 Lakhs per annum during the internship

Salary Package: INR 20.00 Lakhs per annum (Conversion to full-time role based on performance during internship period and the then prevailing market conditions)

job_description:
HyperVerge is a cutting-edge AI company revolutionizing identity verification and fraud prevention for over 100 clients across the US, India, Africa, and the ASEAN region. Our advanced AI technology is trusted by industry giants like Jio, Vodafone, Airbus, SBI, and Bajaj, as well as unicorns such as Grab, Groww, and Cred. To date, we've powered over 750 million AI-based automated ID checks.

 

Our Impact: Enterprises benefit from unparalleled accuracy, evidenced by our ability to prevent an astounding $22M in annual fraud for a single large NBFC.

Our Mission: We're on a mission to hit $100M in revenue in the next four years, and we need a stellar team to get us there. Fields like AI, BFSI, and Crypto are packed with complex ideas that need to be broken down, organized, and presented in a way that clicks with our customers.

Internship Program:

  • Future Leader Program: Our Future Leader Program is your ticket to leadership roles within and outside of HyperVerge, aiming to be the best in the country.
  • Holistic Learning: Interns are welcome in all departments, ensuring a well-rounded experience.
  • Real Responsibilities: Interns and grads handle important tasks, giving you real responsibilities from day one.
  • Top-Notch Mentors: With mentors from around the world, you'll dive into hands-on, challenging projects that will supercharge your learning curve.
  • Training Camps: We run multiple training camps to prep you for the job and your future career.
  • Cross-Functional Learning: Youll have chances to explore different roles and switch teams.
  • Performance-Based Feedback: We provide feedback based on your performance, and if everything aligns, you could join our Future Leader Program.

PRE- REQUISITES 

Must have

  • Python, Deep Learning, and C++ Programming 
  • Hands-on experience with Tensorflow or Pytorch 
  • Prior knowledge and experience with Deep Learning for image/video-related problems
  • Only candidates who are available for a full-time (in-office) internship.

 

Good to have

        Hands-on experience with Tensorflow and Python 

         Preferred if the student has prior internship experience in Deep Learning 


COMPETENCIES


  1. Efficiency and Execution


    1. Able to produce significant output with minimal wasted effort in a timely manner. Focuses on key priorities 
    2. Handles pressure well - performs well under pressure; adheres to timelines, sets goals for self and stays focused 
  2. Self-Starter & Team Player


    • . High level of motivation, proactive, self-starter with ability to quickly identify what needs to be accomplished, craft and drive a solution, strong personal initiative and good judgment 
  1. Works well with cross-functional teams; overcomes obstacles by collaborating with others in the team 
  2. Works proactively without always being told what to do
  1. Learning


    • . Intellectual curiosity - loves to ask questions and is genuinely interested in learning the business needs 
  1. Enthusiastic about learning and trying new approaches, best practices, and ideas and not overly attached to what has worked in the past 
  2. Does not carry around a big ego and ready to collaboratively learn with the team

 

 LocationBengaluru (Onsite, MonFri)
 EligibilityOpen to all disciplines with coding proficiency (final years students, 2026 batch)
package_info:
Duration6 months internship (January 2026-June 2026)
 Stipend45,000 per month (All meals included, Mon–Fri)
 Full-Time ConversionYes, based on performance (FTE CTC: 14–18 LPA)

Zomato is Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 to be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during 06 months Internships from August 2025 to January 2026.

This opportunity begins with an internship starting from July  2025 till December 2025, offering a stipend of INR 1,00,000 per month.

Date of joining as intern: 3rd Week of August 2025


This will transition to a full-time position based on performance during the Internship and the then prevailing market conditions with a salary package of INR 56 Lakhs.

The date of joining as a full-time employee will be June 2026.

Eligible students who have already registered on NPTEL for MOOC courses need to volunteer.

The company will try to close this drive by 14 August.

Please note that 11 August is also the last date to pay the exam fees for the NPTEL courses which you have already registered for. You are advised to make the payment once you receive an offer or are close to that stage. However, you may also pay the exam fee before the interviews, as the last date for a refund of exam fees is 14 August.

Visit the NPTEL website for complete details. Make an informed decisionenrolling for MOOC/NPTEL exams will keep your options open to join Vinsol or any other company if you are in the final selection stage.

Package: The package is INR 15.00 Lacs (INR 12 LPA fixed + INR 3 LPA retention bonus)  based on performance during the internship and, if converted, to a full-time role and the then prevailing market conditions.

 

Note: Eligible students who have already registered on NPTEL for MOOC courses need to volunteer.

 

About Richpanel

At Richpanel, were building autonomous AI agents that enable brands to deliver instant, human-like support at scale  managing millions of customer conversations simultaneously.

These AI agents observe human interactions, learn how to resolve queries, and take action across systems all without being explicitly programmed. We launched in 2020 and have grown rapidly since, helping 2,000+ ecommerce brands redefine their customer experience.

Over the past two years, 90%+ of our interns have received full-time offers and are now key contributors on our product and engineering teams.

Website: https://www.richpanel.com

Its not a coding role, but the company does need students who are technically sound someone who can understand how their platform works, set up accounts, help customers with product configuration, and troubleshoot when needed.

At the same time, this is a customer-facing role, so they are also looking for students who are strong in communication, both written and verbal. Ideally, B.Tech students who are comfortable with tech but want to move into a non-coding role that still involves solving real-world problems and working closely with global customers.

Students who are part of the Parola Literature Club, or active in debates, event hosting, and other extracurriculars, would be a great fit, and they are encouraged to volunteer.

job_description:
Joining Location: Gurgaon

About the role:
The magic at Magicpin is powered using cutting-edge technology built by some of the smartest minds in the industry. We are solving some of the most complex and challenging engineering problems in search & discovery,data science & analytics at a significant scale, and we are growing fast. Our tech stack includes micro services in Go, Java, and Python built on K8s using multiple relational/no-sql and asynchronous communication and public cloud technologies.
If you are an engineer with serious tech chops and love solving high-scale, complex problems in the e-commerce space, we have many challenges for you.
As a Software Engineer, you would be joining our rockstar engineers in one of our application teams.

 

What will you be doing?
Take ownership and deliver solutions that can work at scale with close to zero defects
Produce high-quality code, unit test cases, and deployment scripts
Desire to learn and dive deep into new technologies on the job, especially around modern data
storage and streaming open-source systems (BigTable, Kafka, Solr, Elastic)
Experience building high throughput/low latency systems.
Build a solid understanding of CS fundamentals-Operating Systems, Databases, and Data Structure.
Working very closely with the senior members of the team to come up with better solutions
Bias to action, a hacker's mindset - finding ways to crack the problem at hand, not resting till itis

job_description:
Cadera Infotech - Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 - To be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during 12 months Internships from Aug 2025 to July 2026 

Job Role: IT Developer Trainee

Department: Technology / Software Development / IT Operations

Location: Noida

Role Overview

We are looking for enthusiastic, tech-savvy graduates who are eager to build their careers in the IT domain. As an IT Trainee, you will undergo structured training in software development, systems, and tools used across our organization. Post training, you will be deployed in live-projects across development, testing, DevOps, data engineering, or support roles based on your aptitude and performance.

Key Responsibilities

  • Attend and complete the internal training programs successfully.
  • Work on real-time projects under guidance from senior developers and managers.
  • Participate in code reviews, documentation, and testing cycles.
  • Contribute to technical discussions and agile team activities.
  • Troubleshoot and debug basic technical issues under supervision.
  • Learn and apply modern tools, frameworks, and technologies used in our tech stack.

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • B. Tech (CSE/IT/ECE) 2026 batch.
  • Strong grasp of programming fundamentals (Java, Python, C++).
  • Knowledge of React JS, SQL, OOP concepts, and web technologies (HTML, CSS,
    JavaScript) is a plus.
  • Familiarity with Git, IDEs, and any software development project experience (academic or personal) preferred.
  • Logical reasoning and analytical thinking abilities.
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Eagerness to learn and adapt in a fast-paced environment.

Growth Path
IT Trainee Junior Software Developer / Analyst Software Engineer Module Lead /
Project Engineer / Analyst II


Selection Process
1. Aptitude Test Logical reasoning, quantitative aptitude
2. Coding Assessment Basic programming & algorithmic challenges
3. Technical Interview Core CS concepts, React JS & project discussions
4. HR Interview Communication, mindset, and organizational fit

Conglomerate IT -Hiring Interns Only From Batch 2026-To be Converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance During Internship From August 2025 to July 2026

Mode of Selection:  Virtual

Date of Joining:  1st week of August

Location of Job:  Hyderabad

Duration of Internship: 12 Months

Stipend: INR 25000 Per month

 Package: The package is INR 8.00 Lac  based on performance during the internship and, if converted, to a full-time role and the then prevailing market conditions.

About Company:

ConglomerateIT, is a dynamic startup in the AdTech and MarTech space, known for building cutting-edge AI solutions that power digital advertising, audience targeting, and real-time personalization.

Founded by industry veterans, ConglomerateIT is driven by innovation in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Large Language Models (LLMs) to solve complex business problems at scale.

Learn more about them at: www.conglomerateit.com

 

About the Role What Youll Work On:

  • Develop AI-driven recommendation systems and personalization engines
  • Analyze large structured and unstructured datasets to uncover trends
  • Work on customer segmentation, predictive analytics, and GenAI tools
  • Build data pipelines and ML models using Python, SQL, and industry libraries
  • Present insights via dashboards or visual tools like Power BI, Seaborn, etc.
  • Collaborate with senior AI scientists and engineers

 

Ideal Candidate Profile:

  • Solid understanding of Python and SQL (R is a plus)
  • Familiarity with ML concepts: classification, regression, clustering
  • Hands-on experience with pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, etc.
  • Interest in GenAI, LLMs, or NLP technologies is highly valued
  • Bonus: Exposure to cloud tools (AWS, Azure), GitHub projects, or APIs

 

Why Join ConglomerateIT?

  • Direct mentorship from senior data scientists
  • Hands-on experience in a product-based startup environment
  • Exposure to real-world applications of AI and machine learning
  • Pathway to a full-time role with 8 LPA based on performance

 

Please Note: It is mandatory for students to have attempted the NCET Test to be eligible for participation in this opportunity.

Selection Process:

  1. NCET Test (mandatory)-We will share the test link and the timelines after registration
  2. Domain Competency Test
  3. Technical Interview
  4. HR Discussion

ClearFeed is Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 to be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during 05 months Internships from August 2025 to December 2025.

This opportunity begins with an internship starting from August 2025 to December 2025, offering a stipend of 50,000 per month

Date of joining as intern: 1st week of August 2025


This will transition to a full-time position based on performance during the Internship and the then prevailing market conditions with a salary package of INR 7 Lakhs to 9 Lakhs.

Mode of Selection: Virtual

Company Overview & Job Description

About ClearFeed:

ClearFeed is an AI-powered conversational support platform that streamlines customer and employee interactions on Slack and Microsoft Teams. By integrating with platforms like Zendesk, Jira, and Salesforce, it enhances support efficiency and collaboration. Backed by Peak XVs Surge, 8VC, and top Silicon Valley angels, ClearFeed is at the forefront of redefining enterprise communication and support systems.

Internship Details:

  • Role: Software Engineering Intern

  • Eligible Batch: B.Tech 2026 passouts

  • Duration: 05 Months (Immediate joining)

  • Location: Bengaluru (Work from Office)

  • Stipend: 50,000 per month

  • Pre-Placement Offer (PPO): 7 to 9 LPA (based on performance)

Role & Responsibilities:

  • Build and deploy real product features no internal or dummy projects.

  • Write clean, efficient backend code using NestJS and PostgreSQL.

  • Work across the stack as needed APIs, frontend, and infrastructure.

  • Participate in design discussions and own features end-to-end.

  • Collaborate with senior engineers and receive direct mentorship.

  • Thrive in a high-growth, fast-paced startup environment.

Candidate Profile:

  • B.Tech students (2026 passouts) with minimum CGPA of 7.5+.

  • Strong knowledge of Node.js and TypeScript.

  • Exposure to Sequelize, PostgreSQL, and API design is advantageous.

  • Self-driven, proactive mindset with a strong eagerness to learn.

  • Familiarity with agile development and startup culture preferred.

Hiring Process:

  1. Technical Screening 15-minute discussion on projects and interests.

  2. Problem-Solving Round Coding task using JavaScript/Node.js.

  3. Technical & Culture Fit Round Assessment of technical depth and alignment with team values.

Perks & Benefits:

  • Weekly team lunches and company-sponsored sports activities.

  • Subscription to Cursor for continuous learning.

  • Equity options for high-performing interns.

  • Work on real-world AI and SaaS challenges under expert mentorship.

Booking Holdings is Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 to be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during 06 months Internships from January 2026 to June 2026

This opportunity begins with an internship starting from January 2026 to June 2026, offering a stipend of INR 75,000 per month.

Mode of selection process: Virtual

Date of joining as intern: 1st week of January 2026


This will transition to a full-time position based on performance during the Internship and the then prevailing market conditions with a salary package upto INR 18 Lakhs

About the internship

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Collaborating with engineers and analysts to design, test, and deliver solutions
2. Learning new technologies like full-stack development, data pipelines, PEGA tooling, or SAP modules
3. Participating in Agile ceremonies and cross-functional sprints
4. Writing clean code and documentation
5. Debugging, testing, and learning by doing
6. Asking questions and sharing what you learn, we value curiosity and generosity

 

Who can apply

Only those candidates can apply who:

1. are available for full time (in-office) internship

2. can start the internship between 1st Jan'26 and 7th Jan'26

3. are available for duration of 6 months

4. have relevant skills and interests

 

Other requirements

1. A final-year BE/BTech student, graduating in 2026, from any engineering discipline

2. Curious about software platforms, systems, and how they power real businesses

3. Interested in exploring career paths across engineering, platform development, and enterprise tools

4. Familiar with programming fundamentals (C++, Java, Python, or similar), OOPs, RDBMS

5. A great teammate with strong communication and problem-solving skills

6. Pursuing a PEGA course or certification? Thats great but not required

7. Comfortable in environments that value exploration over perfection

About Booking Holdings India COE

At Booking Holdings, we're more than just a leader in travel, we're shaping how people connect, explore, and experience the world. Through our diverse portfolio of brands, including Booking.com, KAYAK, Priceline, Agoda, Rentalcars.com, and OpenTable, we help millions create meaningful experiences, whether booking a getaway or reserving the perfect meal.

Our success is built on a culture of inclusion, collaboration, and innovation, where diverse voices are valued, and every idea has the potential to make an impact. At Booking Holdings India COE, we combine data, technology, and creativity to build solutions that simplify global travel, enhance financial services, and create seamless customer experiences.

Join us to innovate fearlessly, build connected experiences, and help shape the future of global travel and hospitality. Are you ready to be part of a journey that makes the world more accessible for everyone?

Additional information
The Embark Internship Program is a 6-month, full-time, in-office internship. You'll begin with a common onboarding and evaluation process, after which you'll be matched to one of the following focus areas based on your skills and learning goals: 

1. Software Engineering – writing code, solving backend/frontend problems, shipping features
2. SAP – supporting enterprise systems, financial operations, and process improvements
3. PEGA – design scalable business applications and intelligent automation

Developers (Software Engineers) - .NET, C#, .NET Core, MVC, Web API, React, Entity Framework, MS-SQL and Automation testing

job_description:
rtCamp is Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 to be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during 06 months Internships from January 2026 to June 2026

This opportunity begins with an internship starting from January 2026 to June 2026, offering a stipend of INR 25,000 per month.

Date of joining as intern: 1st week of January 2026


This will transition to a full-time position based on performance during the Internship and the then prevailing market conditions with a salary package between INR 10.50 Lakhs to INR 13.50 Lakhs.

Compensation Structure:

  • During probation (~first 6 months): A monthly salary of 25,000.
  • Upon confirmation (~post 6 months): The monthly salary will be revised to a range of 75,000 to 1,00,000, based on performance.

A fixed confirmation bonus of 50,000.

 

  • Retention bonus: Upon completing 12 months of total tenure, a retention bonus of 1,00,000 will be credited.

 

These figures exclude applicable business-related reimbursements.

 

Job Profile

PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS and MySQL development for Web development using WordPress CMS/framework primarily

 

Service Agreement

Given the extensive training, mentorship, and onboarding support provided during the probationary period, a Service Agreement will have to be signed on or before the date of joining. This agreement requires a minimum commitment of 18 months (including the 6-month probation period).

About this position:

We are looking for PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS and JavaScript developers and train them to build web solutions using mainly WordPress CMS/framework for our large enterprise clients such as Google, Facebook (Meta), IndianExpress, Penske Media and Al Jazeera, which millions of people use daily.

This role offers hands-on experience in web development, focusing on front-end design and back-end implementation.

Responsibilities

  • Deliver secure, scalable, and easy-to-maintain WordPress solutions using engineering best practices and relevant coding standards.
  • Write clean, optimized, readable, and reusable code along with test cases for all the code you develop for easy maintenance.
  • Write and maintain technical project documentation, including inline code commenting, GitHub repo README, and clear commit messages.
  • Deliver high-quality plugins and design responsive themes with great attention to detail.
  • Able to understand project/client requirements and deliver effective solutions.
  • Manage time well and focus on details to meet deadlines.
  • Prioritizing to meet deadlines and maintaining proactive communication is essential for effective collaboration within our remote team.

 

Must Haves

  • Solid understanding of web development fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL. Especially JavaScript.
  • Proficiency in PHP syntax, databases, OOP, debugging, and frameworks.
  • Familiarity with version control software such as Git for collaborative development.
  • Knowledge of basic architectural concepts relevant to web development, including background job processing.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to learn new technologies quickly.

 

Good to Have

  • WordPress plugin and theme development proficiency.
  • Familiarity with front-end technologies: Gutenberg, FSE, React.js, Vue.js, AngularJS.
  • Knowledge of package managers like Composer.
  • Experience with web servers such as Nginx, Apache.
  • Understanding of unit testing frameworks.
  • Adherence to coding standards and best practices.
  • Experience in contributing to open-source.
  • Basic knowledge of hardware (CPU, RAM, Motherboard, etc.) for a hosting server.

 

Next Steps

  • Details about the Campus Program - careers.rtcamp.com/campus
  • The shortlisting process will take anywhere from 15 to 30 business days.
  • Interviews of the shortlisted students will be conducted over Zoom, and students will receive the interview schedule on their registered email.

 

Important details

  • Students from CS/CE/IT backgrounds are welcome to apply.
  • To prepare thoroughly and gain a better understanding of the training program, students may go through the following course: https://learn.rtcamp.com/courses/wordpress-development/

 

 

Student Eligibility:

  • Solid understanding of computer fundamentals.
  • Well-maintained GitHub profile with a codebase demonstrating your skills.
  • Shortlisting will be based on open-source contributions on GitHub, specifically quality pull requests (PRs)to well-regarded projects.
  • What well consider: PRs to:

 

  • WordPress
  • Frappe
  • React
  • PHP, JS, Python repos with 10K+stars
  • What well exclude: First Contributions Repos with just README files or list-style content Non-code contributions

 

  • Note: Low-quality or rejected PRs will be negatively ranked.

Recruit CRM is Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 to be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during 09 months Internships from January 2026 to September 2026

Date of joining as intern: 1st week of January 2026

  • Training/ Internship Period & Stipend - 
    • 3-month part-time internship at INR 7,500/month
    • 6-month full-time training at INR 20,000/month

This will transition to a full-time position based on performance during the Internship and the then prevailing market conditions with a salary package of INR 9 Lakhs.

Mode of Selection: Virtual

  • 100% Remote Work work from anywhere in India. 
  • Exposure to AI-supported development and real-world SaaS product building

 

 Company Overview:

Join our high-growth SaaS company, Recruit CRM, where innovation meets impact! With a 40% YoY growth, we power over 1700 top Executive Search and Recruitment firms across 100+ countries. Headquartered across the US, Ireland, India, and Dubai, we are ranked #1 in our category by Gartner and boast a stellar 4.9/5 rating on Capterra & G2. Discover more about us at www.recruitcrm.io.

Why Join Us?

  • Fully remote with flexible working hours
  • Sponsored L&D programs
  • Company-paid team outbounds
  • Competitive pay & full insurance coverage
  • After one year of being an employee, you're eligible for our ARR-Linked Performance Bonus, announced every January 1st. Inclusion and bonus amounts are subject to management discretion.

 

If you're looking for a high-impact role where you learn fast, solve real-world problems and contribute to cutting-edge product development, this is your place!

Current Opening:

As a Trainee Software Engineer, youll be involved in all aspects of software developmentfrom building features from scratch to enhancing existing modules. Youll be an integral part of the engineering team, working on scalable solutions in SaaS recruitment technology with exposure to AI-driven innovations. This role lays a strong foundation to launch your career in tech.

Location: Remote What You Will Do:

  • Work closely with software developers to develop the best implementations
  • Develop efficient, reusable, reliable, and scalable software
  • Build features and modules from scratch
  • Maintain existing features and modules
  • Key skills - Java/Python/AI/ML

Selection Process (Online/Virtual)

Our selection process includes multiple stages such as an online MCQ test, a coding assessment, and virtual interviewseach designed to evaluate your analytical thinking, logical reasoning, problem-solving abilities, and communication skills.

Eraah is Hiring Interns Only from Batch 2026 to be converted to Full Time Role Based on Performance during 12 months Internships from August 2025 to July 2026.

This opportunity begins with an internship starting from August 2025 to July 2026, offering a stipend of 15,000 / month + 5,000 / month (performance-based) + free accommodation

.

Date of joining as intern: 1st week of August 2025


This will transition to a full-time position based on performance during the Internship and the then prevailing market conditions with a salary package of INR 10 Lakhs.

Mode of Selection: Virtual

Company Overview & Job Description

Eraah is a mission-driven tech company building AI-powered infrastructure to reduce operational costs and increase impact for NGOs and social enterprises. Incubated by Nasscom and backed by top ecosystem leaders, we are looking for driven, entrepreneurial interns who want to build solutions that matter.

Were offering paid PPO-track internships with immediate joining. Some roles are full-time (in-office, housing provided), while others are part-time (remote-friendly).

Internship Details:

  • Duration: 12 months
  • Start Date: Immediate
  • Stipend: Full-time (In-office, Gurgaon): 15,000 + 5,000/month (performance-based) + free accommodation

 

  • PPO Opportunities available for high performers
  • Flexible work structure depending on the role

 

Role 1: Full Stack Developer AI/ML Focus

Responsibilities:

  • Build and maintain full-stack applications with AI/ML integrations
  • Develop AI pipelines and deploy ML models in real-world applications
  • Work with real-time data processing and API endpoints
  • Optimize ML models for scalability

 

Requirements:

  • Strong in Python, Node.js, or similar backend languages
  • Hands-on with ML libraries (TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc.)
  • Basic understanding of deploying ML models
  • Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL databases

 

Role 2: Full Stack Developer DevOps Focus

Responsibilities:

  • Build full-stack applications and manage DevOps infrastructure
  • Automate CI/CD pipelines and cloud deployments

 

 

  • Monitor system performance and reliability
  • Use tools like Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions

 

Requirements:

  • Comfortable with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP)
  • Hands-on with Git, Linux, and Docker
  • Understanding of deployment automation
  • Backend experience preferred

 

Role 3: Full Stack Developer Security Focus

Responsibilities:

  • Secure web and backend systems through best practices
  • Conduct vulnerability assessments and apply fixes
  • Ensure data privacy and secure integrations
  • Work with security monitoring tools

 

Requirements:

  • Familiarity with OWASP Top 10
  • Experience with secure coding (authentication, encryption)
  • Knowledge of threat modeling and response
  • JavaScript or Python-based full stack experience

 

Role 4: Full Stack Developer Frontend Focus

Responsibilities:

  • Design and build intuitive user interfaces
  • Translate Figma/mockups into functional UI
  • Collaborate with backend team for seamless UX
  • Optimize for responsiveness and performance

 

Requirements:

  • Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React.js
  • Experience with frontend tools (Tailwind, Vite, etc.)
  • Understanding of REST APIs
  • Eye for design and UX

 

Role 5: Full Stack Developer QA/Testing Focus

Responsibilities:

 

  • Write unit, integration, and E2E tests
  • Ensure consistent quality of releases
  • Work with devs to debug and fix issues
  • Automate testing via tools like Cypress or Selenium

 

Requirements:

  • Strong in testing frameworks (Jest, Mocha, Cypress)
  • Familiarity with CI/CD integration
  • Understanding of software lifecycle and QA processes
  • Full stack coding basics a must

 

What We Offer:

  • High-impact work in the social sector
  • Mentorship & rapid learning environment
  • Pre-Placement Offer (PPO) opportunities
  • Accommodation for full-time interns

 

Location: Gurgaon (Full-time, with housing) | www.eraah.org

This is an excellent opportunity to be part of a world-renowned organization that operates across 200+ countries and territories, driving innovation, security, and inclusion in the digital economy.

You will:

  • Design and develop secure, scalable, and maintainable software.

  • Participate in all stages of the development lifecycle.

  • Currently in final year of Bachelor's or integrated Masters program (Graduating in 2026).

Founded in 2015, Shipsy is a global AI-first logistics technology platform revolutionizing the multi-trillion-dollar supply chain industry.   • Recognized in Gartner Magic Quadrant 2025 for Transportation Management Systems (TMS)

  • Named Customers Choice 2024 for TMS

  • Backed by Peak XV and A91 Partners with over $35M in funding

  • Global footprint across India, Middle East, Europe, Southeast Asia, ANZ, UK

  • Recent acquisition of Stockone (WMS) to enhance platform capability

Global Expansion Timeline:

  • 2021: Opened international HQ in Dubai, expanded rapidly in Middle East

  • 2022: Series B funding and expansion into Europe and the UK

  • 2023: 100% YoY growth, new HQs in Netherlands & Riyadh, acquired Stockone

  • 2024: Recognized by Gartner and named Customers Choice for TMS

A signed cheque of INR 1,00,000 in the name of JTG E-Business Software Pvt Ltd has to be deposited as a security. This shall be returned to him/her post-completion of 6 months of full-time employment.

Job Role: Cloud ERP Consulting 12-Month Intern

 

The selected students will be given internships in different roles and verticals as per availability.

 

Salary Package Details:

Stipend during internship: INR 35,000 PM

Compensation in full-time role: INR 15.5 Lacs (Salary INR-10 LPA + 2.75 Lacs RSU +2.75 Lacs Joining bonus)

Permanent employment is confirmed after 12 months of internship, based on performance and the then prevailing market conditions.

Online test (60 minutes) likely on 15 July 2025 (morning slot) and technical interviews Virtual model)

Selection Process:  Online test (60 minutes) and technical interviews Virtual/physical)

Start Date of Internship: Aug 2025

End Date of Internship: July/Aug 2026

 

Location of Job:  Bangalore (Relocation is mandatory).

 

SAP Labs India (SLI) is the fastest-growing subsidiary of SAP, a multinational company that provides customers with world-class business solutions. Founded in November 1998, SAP Labs India drives SAP's product strategy, is responsible for SAP's core solutions, and provides product localization and India-specific solutions. What is unique to SAP Labs India is that it represents the entire breadth of SAP product portfolio and contributes to SAP flagship products like the Business Technology Platform, SAP S/4 HANA, Financial Management, Supply Chain Management, CRM and Customer Experience, Spend Management, RISE with SAP, Sustainability, and Business Networks.

SAP Labs India is present in 5 locations – Bangalore, Gurgaon, Pune, Mumbai, and Hyderabad. Our holistic approach to innovation is customer-centric and agile. We focus on making innovation real by covering all areas of the innovation equation, from user experience, business model design, and technology.

1.     There would be pre-screening from the database before the selection process.

2.     Selected students will be joining as an intern from Ist week ofAug 2025.

job_description:
About The Company:
 
CareEco Technologies is world's first company focused on creating a more efficient and integrated healthcare (and body care) ecosystem.
It operates under two brand names: Elixire and Curepoint.
Elixire strives to empower every player, big or small, of the industry with power of Tech and Data. It will enable players to have faster response time and make learned decisions which finally will translate into more responsive, safe and comfortable healthcare ecosystem for the mankind.
Curepoint is a one point of health solution for anyone seeking to improve his/her health

We are rated 4.4/5 on ambition box by our employees and interns (https://www.ambitionbox.com/reviews/careeco-technologies-reviews)
 
Recruitment Process a shsared by the company:
The process has TWO steps:
 
1.        Group Activity: The interested students are required to participate in a group activity and submit an assignment. Interested students are required to work in group of TWOs, however below rules are applicable to create groups:
   a.        One person shall be well versed with technologies related to backend i.e. (s)he is responsible to do all backend related work in the assignment.
    b.        The second person shall be an expert on the front end side. This person will ensure look and feel and the user experience.
   c.        Interested students shall form their own groups and submit their interest by applying (in group of twos) through the link which we will be sharing by tomorrow.
   d.        Once we receive the application, assignments will be given to the selected teams separately.
    e.        Teams will get a week to submit the assignment though the assignment can be finished in 3 days. The teams shall try to submit the assignment as soon as possible (speed matters).
    f.        The submitted assignment will play a significant role in the final selection but is not the sole criteria, however selection for the subsequent rounds will be done based on the submissions.

2.        Personal Interviews: Selected students will undergo the process of Personal Interviews. 2-3 rounds of personal interviews will take place. The candidates can be eliminated after each round.

Founded in 2021 by Sunny Garg, Shaifali Jain, and Archit Chauhana fellow JIITian from the 2018 batchCrib simplifies property management with features such as automatic rent reminders, tenant KYC, digital agreements, finance management, and more.Currently, we serve 1,500+ businesses managing 100,000+ beds, backed by Rebright Partners, WFC, and over 50 angel investorsincluding the founders of Cred, Paytm, BharatPe, and Mamaearth. SOC & Hard Macro Physical Design
SOC Validation & Debug
RF & Analog Layout
RF/Analog/Mixed Signal/Power IC Design
Low Power Design
Board and FPGA Design
Digital ASIC Design
Design/SOC Verification
CAD Solution Engineer
Design for Test (DFT)
CPU Design

BTech-ECE, Intg ECE and MTech VLSI

 • Verifying SoC with embedded RISC/DSP processors, communications/ networking ASICs.
• Verilog or VHDL, C/C++, Tcl/Perl/shell-scripting. RTL design experience and/or strong OO programming knowledge
• Knowledge of wireless/wired communications and protocols or graphics/video multi-media is a plus.
• Knowledge in PLL, LNA, OpAmp, CMOS, ADC/DAC, Cadence, SpectreRF, or Layout is required in RF/Analog/Mixed Signal IC Design.
• Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to collaborate and work in teams.
• Good verbal and written communication skills

About Darwinbox:
 
Darwinbox is Asias fastest-growing SaaS-based HR Technology platform. A brainchild of alumni from the countrys most distinguished institutions (IIT/IIM/XLRI) and organizations (McKinsey, EY, Google), Darwinbox is the preferred technology partner of 500+ global enterprises with more than 1 million+ employees using the platform. Our end to-end HCM technology suite competes with the best in the business and has won against giants such as SAP, Oracle, and Workday several times to acquire iconic enterprise customers ranging from the largest conglomerates to unicorns - Adani, Mahindra, Kotak, TVS, Arvind, Nivea, Puma, Swiggy, Paytm, Bigbasket and Delhivery etc. The rate at which our product and market presence is growing is unprecedented. Were a rocketship. Were not planning on slowing down anytime soon. And, thats why we need you!

job_description:
About us:
At its heart, Probo is Indias leading online skill gaming platform building prediction markets for India. On Probo, users can find questions on many topics of their interest, like sports, news, finance and many more. Users can swipe yes or no to express their opinion and place trade(s), and by doing so they enter into an event contract with another user on the other side of the trade. Probo is a matching engine that enables the execution of this event contract. Each trade is INR 10, and at the end of the event contract, the user with the correct opinion wins the quantum at stake. We're also backed by 3 marquee investors- Sequoia, Elevation and Fundamental.

Duration of Internship: 6 Months. (July to December, 2025)

Stipend: INR 30,000/- per month


Job Requirements:
Love for solving complex problems from scratch
Good to have: Prior internship experience and comfort with handling
complex systems
Ability to build scalable, sustainable, reliable and secure products that
generate user love
Ability to bring new practices, architectural choices and new initiatives onto
the table to make overall tech stack more robust
History and familiarity with server side architecture based on APIs,
databases, infrastructure and systems.
Ability to own the technical road map for systems/components

job_description:
About Richpanel

At Richpanel, were building autonomous AI agents that enable brands to deliver instant, human-like support at scale  managing millions of customer conversations simultaneously.

These AI agents observe human interactions, learn how to resolve queries, and take action across systems all without being explicitly programmed. We launched in 2020 and have grown rapidly since, helping 2,000+ ecommerce brands redefine their customer experience.

Over the past two years, 90%+ of our interns have received full-time offers and are now key contributors on our product and engineering teams.

Website: https://www.richpanel.com

 

Quick Highlights

  • Role: Work with our product engineering team to build and ship real product features that power Richpanels AI customer support platform.
  • Tech: Fullstack development (Vue + Node.js + MongoDB/SQL). Along with AI tools like Copilot, ChatGPT, and Cursor.
  • Stage: Fast-growing product startup, building autonomous AI agents for global ecommerce brands. Multi-million ARR and growing rapidly.

About the Internship

As a Fullstack Intern, youll:

  • Contribute directly to production-grade features used by thousands of businesses
  • Work with modern tools and frameworks (Vue.js, Node.js, MongoDB)
  • Be mentored by experienced engineers and learn how real-world software gets built
  • Use AI tools like Copilot, Cursor, and ChatGPT to speed up development
  • Get regular code reviews, feedback, and growth plans designed to help you ramp up fast

Youre a Great Fit If You...

  • Have strong fundamentals in data structures, algorithms, and web development
  • Are comfortable with JavaScript, Node.js, and modern frontend frameworks
  • Are a fast learner whos excited to work in a fast-paced, product-focused startup
  • Enjoy writing clean, modular code and solving real technical problems
  • Take ownership, communicate clearly, and collaborate well with others

Why Join Richpanel as an Intern?

  • Impact from Day 1: Work on meaningful projects your code will ship to production.
  • Learning-First Culture: Youll receive mentorship, code reviews, and lots of ownership.
  • AI-First Company: Learn how developers build with AI and become 10x faster.
  • Path to Full-Time: 90%+ of our interns have converted to full-time roles in the last 2 years.

job_description:
We are hiring for an Interns for the profile of Product Management.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Product Management Intern to deliver awesome experiences to millions of users on mobile. This position is responsible to strategize the full product lifecycle from conception through release. Shall also be responsible for cross-functional teams to create successful products that will improve consumer experience and grow market share.

Be the customer-expert and solve customer problems; be fully knowledgeable of pain points experienced by customers and work with the team to identify opportunities for improvement
Should be data obsessed. Derive insights from data and use the same for product improvements and iterations.

Product ownership and project management throughout the product lifecycle from initial concept, scope, design, development, to final delivery and post-launch follow-up.
Collaborate with developers on product development and validate technical design against product requirements.

Drive large-scale products to success by working cross-functionally with the product, design, technology, editorial and marketing teams.

Develop product strategies and articulate vision through detailed product specifications including feature lists, product requirements, user stories, flows and wireframes.

Gather and manage product feedback through surveys, concept testing, analytics tools, and A/B testing.

REQUIRED SKILLS:

Experience: Fresher or ( 0-1) year as product manager, preferably in B2C/ Mobile Apps is a Plus

Bachelor's degree in technology, Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, or a related field

Must have used Google Analytics, Data Studio or Power BI, SQL

Knowledge of SEO, A/B testing, PLC management, UI, UX, and Visual Design

Well versed with agile methodologies

A passion for working with data and understanding its impact on business decisions.

WHAT CAN YOU EXPECT IN RETURN?

Well, an incredibly supportive, open & innovative environment
Lots of ownership, learning & superb growth
A great brand in the vernacular space

Internship Duration - 6 months (Work From Office)

Stipend - INR 25,000/- per month

Working Days - Monday to Friday

Joining as Intern: July - Dec, 2025 (06 Months)

Selection Process:

  1. Assignment
  2. Ist Round with Product Head - Tech Round
  3. Tech Head
  4. Business Head Round.

 

Thanks & Regards

Vinod Kumar
Sr. Officer - T & P
JIIT, Noida

The Techolution Story:

Techolution is a leading innovation consulting company on track to become one of the most admired brands in the world for "innovation done right". Our purpose is to harness our expertise in novel technologies to deliver more profits for our enterprise clients while helping them deliver a better human experience for the communities they serve. With that, we are now fully committed to helping our clients build the enterprise of tomorrow by making the leap from Lab Grade AI to Real World AI. In 2019, we won the prestigious Inc. 500 Fastest-Growing Companies in America award, only 4 years after its formation. In 2022, Techolution was honored with the Best-in-Business title by Inc. for Innovation Done Right. Most recently, we received the AIConics trophy for being the Top AI Solution Provider of the Year at the AI Summit in New York. 

Global Presence:

We currently serve across the United States with our headquarters in the heart of downtown New York City. We have Techolution City in Hyderabad, India as our offshore development center as a living and breathing lab for our IoT Smart City products. Techolution also serves APAC from our Jakarta, Indonesia & Singapore office and the Mauritius office supports our initiatives on African content. We have recently started our offices in Johannesburg, as an extended support to the South African region and in Ireland, marking our European presence. 

Lets give you more insights!

Unlocking Success in AI Disruption: Insights from Award-Winning AI Leader, Luv Tulsidas : 

Less than 1% of AI generates real value for businesses, despite the ongoing hype. Despite trusted advisers advocating the "innovate, fail, fail faster" mantra, 80% of innovation projects in Enterprises fail, wasting years and millions of dollars.

In collaboration with Forbes, an award-winning AI Leader, Author & Entrepreneur, Luv Tulsidas has formulated a secret recipe book to share proven and battle-tested strategies for succeeding faster in this new era of AI disruption. Reports from CEOs who tested these secrets reveal tangible success. Startups, often seen as free from legacy baggage, also face challenges, with 90% going out of business before realizing their vision.
"Failing Fast?" is more than a readit's your guide to conquering change. Connect with the author [https://lnkd.in/gGh_5vuG] and watch the motive behind creating this secret recipe book [https://lnkd.in/gSMGE4HR].

Work with one of the oldest and most experimentative retail commerce technology companies of India!

We list below the parameters over which we assess potential candidates.
 

Role: Full Stack Developer

 

Affordmed is a frontrunner in India's medical devices industry serving leading hospitals, medical institutes and diagnostic labs across 10 countries for over 2 decades. We're presently hiring a Full-Stack Developer for the eCommerce and SaaS vertical. Joining us means stepping into an early-stage startup environment where your contributions shape new platforms and products. It's more than a role - it's a chance to thrive in a dynamic ecosystem, fostering both personal and professional growth amidst rapid innovation.

Responsibilities

  • Develop robust and scalable products using Go Lang, ReactJS and NextJS harnessing its features and adaptability.
  • Create backend platform elements capable of handling high throughput and achieving low latency.
  • Collaborate in a dynamic environment to ensure timely delivery of tasks.
  • Demonstrate a keen drive to make a programmer's impact, coupled with a desire to learn and engage with new technology stacks.

Required Skills

  • Proficiency in constructing and expanding robust backend services
  • Previous practical involvement in developing scalable web applications using GoLang, ReactJS and NextJS.
  • Familiarity with Agile methodology
  • Competence in version control systems such as Git
  • Proficiency in Dockerization, Kubernetes, CI/CD
  • Knowledge of MS Azure or similar cloud platforms (AWS/GCP)
  • Understanding of SQL databases and proficiency in writing SQL queries
  • Experience in designing RESTful, scalable, and highly responsive APIs
  • Familiarity with testing frameworks
  • Experience in Caching and utilising Redis

Preferred Skills

  • Previous involvement in E-Commerce or related fields
  • Ability to conceptualise and craft UI/UX interfaces with a keen design sense
  • Deep comprehension of Microservices architectures

Location: Hyderabad

Disclaimer: Afford Medical Technologies Private Limited and its affiliates, staff, executives, contractors, etc., do not request or collect any fees from prospective candidates during the recruitment process. No individual, agency, or entity is authorised to recruit candidates on our behalf. Any individual seeking employment with Affordmed should exercise caution and avoid trusting any agency or individual claiming to represent us and charging fees for employment opportunities. If you encounter such requests or instances, please notify us immediately at contact@affordmed.com.



Assessment Criteria:

  • Candidate must have at least implemented one project in any one relevant Frontend (ReactJS/NextJS) or Backend (GoLang, NodeJS or NestJS) Web Framework
  • Github based shortlisting before tests and interviews
  • Any candidates with plagiarized code from online platforms or LLMs like LeetCode, HackerRank, GeeksforGeeks, ChatGPT, Gemini, etc. in the coding test that we conduct will not be considered.

Evaluation Stages:

  1. Coding Test - Web Development/Data Structures/Algorithms/Problem Solving
  2. Code Pairing Interview
  3. Web Apps related Interview
  4. HR Interview

Offer:

  • Joining Date: Ist June, 2025 as Intern.
  • Probation: From joining date until end of June 2026.

Confirmation after probation is subject to satisfactory performance of the candidate. Probation shall be remote until January 2026.

 

  • Service Agreement: From joining date till June 2027. 20% of the Salary Package will be the penalty if students leave the Internship before 1 year.
package_info:
Compensation details.:

o    Rs. 3 Lakhs during Probation (Rs. 25,000/- Per Month) during Internship of 1 Year.

o    Rs. 8 Lakhs after confirmation to Full Time Role.

o    Components: Salary, Bonus, Employer's PF Contribution, Health Insurance Premium, Gratuity.

o    Medical Insurance of Rs. 3 Lakhs (Subject to change based on negotiations with concerned insurers).

o    Breakup/Pay Structure of Monthly Pay/Bonus/TDS/PF/ESI etc. are subject to changes based on Code of Social Security and any IT Act amendments.

Kind Attn: BTech, Intg, MTech - CSE, IT, ECE, and VLSI students of the 2026 batch.

ST Microelectronics is hiring one-year interns from the 2026 batch through a campus drive.

 

Eligibility Criteria: As per placement policy, BTech, Intg, MTech - CSE, IT, ECE and VLSI having CGPA 7.0 & above, Xth and XII 70% & above, with No active backlog(s)


All students are advised to participate in all placement drives (where eligible) and secure an offer at the earliest.

Job Role: One-Year Intern

  •        Digital Design SoC/IP
  •        Analog / Mixed Signal Silicon Validation / Testing
  •        Automation / CAD SW
  •        AI / ML Chip/IP Design
  •        Software Development
  •        Embedded SW/HW Dev
  •        SoC System Architecture
  •        Digital Power applications

Stipend during internship:

For BTech Students: INR 30,000 PM

For Intg & MTech Students: INR 35,000 PM

Selection Process:  Resume shortlisting, Online Test/ Physical Interviews (on 3rd April Thursday)

Start Date of Internship: Ist week of June/July 2025

End Date of Internship: June/July 2026

Internship Location:  Greater Noida

  
About the Company: STMicroelectronics is a global semiconductor company serving customers with innovations that make a positive impact on people's lives. Our advanced technology forms the hidden part of the world we live in today. We create and deliver our technology as microchips (or just chips), which are embedded in the most advanced innovations. They are an essential part of products as diverse as electric cars and key fobs, giant factory machines and data centers, washing machines and hard disks, and Smartphones.

2.     Selected students will be joining as an intern from Ist week of June/July 2025.

All The Best!

 

Anita Marwaha

job_description:
Kind attention: B. Tech. CSE, IT & ECE Students of 2026 Batch


Amazon is hiring tech interns for Non SDE roles from the 2026 batch through campus drive.

They are looking for smart young professionals with high learning abilities, excellent communication and strong programming skills.

All eligible students must participate in the drives, where eligible, and gain invaluable experience of the placement drives.

Eligibility Criteria: As per placement policy dt 08th Feb 2025, B. Tech. CSE, IT & ECE students with CGPA of 6.50 & above. No active backlog(s) at the time of registering for the drive.

 Intern Roles:

Job Title

Internship Duration (6 Months) 

Internship Stipend

Front-End Engineer I

July - December

INR 110000

Quality Assurance Engineer I

July - December

INR 50000

Support Engineer II

July - December

INR 50000

System Development Engineer I

July - December

INR 70000

 

Job Location: Pan India, (Bangalore, Hyderabad, Chennai, Gurugram, etc.) as per the role offered & business requirements.

Extension of further internship and permanent employment is confirmed after 6 months of internship, based on performance and the then prevailing market conditions.

 

Selection Process: Online test from computer labs followed by technical interviews. (Dates will be shared in the next mail)


Important Points

1.     There would be pre-screening from the database before the selection process.

2.     Selected students will be joining as an intern from Ist week of July 2025.

3.     There is no upper limit of selection numbers and thus maximum students should derive the advantage of making it to big.

4.     Selected students will be eligible for virtual mass recruitment drives till they get their first full time mass recruitment offer.

5.     If the students are not offered further internship or full time offers by Amazon, they will be permitted to participate in placement drives as per policy.

 

Registration:

The internship timeline and stipend details as received from Amazon are shared above. These details must be read before registering for the drive.
